content.detailedDescription: Information entered by mufon field investigator. witness wants to remain anonymous. witness was leaving his job and heading to a friends house when he felt a warmth in his head and a voice that told him to go to his parents home.  he arrived at his parents home around 3:30am. as he pulled up to the driveway he noticed that the driveway light had just turned off like someone had been there. the home is located on a wooded light with no neighbors nearby. as he got out of his car he heard a metalic sound like something hit a rock. in the home he heard the dogs barking frantically. he looked out a small, open window and saw two red orbs. each contained a small "gray" creature about 3 1/2 to 4 feet tall. as he watched he saw about 2 to 4 shadows between the orbs and his window. they seemed to be about 6 feet high. they were making bliping noise as if they were speaking to each other. he felt they were trying to get into the house through the opened window.  he grabbed a stoker rod from the fireplace and went outside to chase them away. he remembers turning the corner of the house and then "waking" with the stoker lying on the ground next to him. he said that he lost about 1 to 2 hours of his memory. his mind was all messed up like he had been on anesthesia. also his right foot which was broken some time before the incident was now healed but now his left leg hurt.  he also notice the his clothes were not on him right...Like they were remove and put back on wrong. he felt very disoriented and exhausted. he felt he could not make it back to the house so he sat in his car for a couple of hours until his mom came out to walk the dogs in the morning. he told her what had happened. the witness has dreams.  since he was around 18 everything has a 31 in it���all his passwords, etc.  this happened on his 31st birthday.  he always had dreams since he was 18 where it was things he never knew about like quantum physics, einstein���s theories, time and space were 3 dimensional, unified field theory.  he would wake up and write them down and then look them up and verified what he had dreamt. witness feels he has been observed for many years but only while at his parents home.  he found out later that his stepfather also had visits.
content.summary: Saw small "grays" in orange/red orb with larger "grays" walking about

content.detailedDescription:
Uploading video 
picture was take at same location using flash my mom took pic and recorded video with her phone
content.summary: Not sure what it was

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were on our way to work, and noticed a very big and bright object rising from the woods from the west. the object went up then took a path from sw to se  . looked like a giant orange ball, no blinking no other lights just solid orangeish red light ball. we stopped on the road to watch it. the object as it was flying over looked like it was sewing something out of it over and over, mad no sound at all. it would move and spew something out of it off and on was not a constant spew. the spew dropped out of the bottom of it not the sides. we watched it till more traffic  came down the road an had to move. we felt more amazed than anything at what we saw, no other effects. about the photo, my wife was trying to take a picture hanging out of the car while we were stopped. she didnt have a long time to take it cause of cars come down the highway. but she took it up in the air and got a few objects on the picture you can see some shape and some orange mist spewing from it. now from where we could see it just looked like a giant ball
content.summary: Ufo acended from behing woods then took a path across the road

content.detailedDescription: Seen a real bright white light with blue & red orbs flying around it at 6:51pm in north west new jersey until 8:10 pm when it moved south over the threes and out of sight. heard absolutely no sounds at all.
content.shape: Boomerang,   Bullet,   Missile,   Cigar,   Circle,   Cross,   Cylinder,   Diamond,   Disc,   Flash,   Oval,   Sphere
content.summary: Real bright white light with blue & red orbs flying around it

content.detailedDescription: I was inside watching tv. my wife went to take the dogs outside and she yelled for me to come out. my daughter said "dad mom just yelled for you to go outside." i thought that maybe there was something wrong with one of the dogs or an animal had gotten into the yard and the dogs were going after it. ran out and she told me to look up. i saw this object that looked like it was on fire almost. had 5 to 6 appendages protruding below it. i yelled to my daughter to get my phone so i could get a picture of it. she didn't here me so i went in to get my phone and told her what we were looking at and to come out. by the time i got back out the object was moving off to the east. i told my daughter to go get the video camera. she did, turned on the camera and got a little bit of footage. i only got one picture with my phone. the picture isn't great because by then it was to far away for a close shot. i told my daughter go get the car keys and we went to try and catch up to it. i chased it through three towns. never got another shot. when i got back i spoke to my wife about what had happened. she told me that when she looked up she saw the object hovering over or close to our house. when she yelled for me the object then began to move off. what is so weird is on 10/31/2013 i had been watching the planet/star or whatever it is in the sky. and had noticed that it had something orbiting around it. i had been observing it the object orbiting it. for hours it changed positions through the night. also had been trying to research if anyone else had noticed these events. next day i have a ufo over my house. to me that seemed a little weird. as amazed as i was by seeing this object it wasn't the first one i had seen. and certainly not the biggest. this one almost seemed like a probe in my opinion. it reminded my kind of the lunar lander because the appendages/legs below the object.
content.summary: Orange and red. looked like it was on fire almost. round verticle cone shape with 5 to 6 protrusains below it.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving eastbound on the 60 freeway through pomona. i just drove past the 71 interchange. i spotted two white, circular objects in the sky. at first i thought it was the sun reflecting off windows on the houses in the mountain. then i noticed other drivers looking in the direction. they were very far apart. one appeared out by the san bernardino area and the other was closer to the mountains near rancho cucamonga. as the freeway dipped down, i lost sight of them, but i saw a commercial airplane flying west from ontario international airport. the plane was flying very slow. as i continued to drive i saw three very large black helicopters suddenly appear and flew southwest very quickly. i got off the freeway at euclid ave and was still unable to see anything, but i drove east just north of the freeway and saw one light again. at this time i noticed a strange pink/brown/orange mist like cloud that made the sky look like there was a fire, a normal sight for october for this area. the one i believed to be by the san bernardino mountain range. from my view at the kaiser on vineyard ave, it appeared away from the mountains now and was moving west. i pulled into a parking lot to try and take a photo, but it asdfghisappeared and then reappeared only to be heading south. i was unable to take a photo because it was too high or the light was becoming more dim. i continued east and saw another light, exactly the same, but bright white, just as they were while i was on the freeway, in the southeast. then, as i was looking at it, it was gone; it did not move, just disappeared. as i pulled into the alleyway behind my house, i saw it again in the east. this time, i did get a photo. by the time i parked my car and walked upstairs, it was gone, although it would have been in plain sight. lastly, by the time i took the picture, the smoke/mist was gone.
i am a rational person and i thought it was light reflecting from the mountain side houses, but the other houses were yellow in color. then i thought planes or helicopters, but that made no sense based on size and movement or lack there of (hard to tell while driving). i thought bright street lights. then i called my mom.
any movement other than the two disappearing in front of me, would be two hard to describe, as i was driving.
i was pretty freaked out when i called my mom because i could not explain it. she told me that i reacted the way i did because what i saw was not normal for my drive and my gut told me. when i saw the first one disappear and then reappear, i assumed i blinked or was too busy messing with my camera. the second time, i was on the phone with her again, looking right at the light and it was gone. i freaked out with that. my stomach felt weird andasfgh my whole body got the chills. at that point i had nothing to explain what i saw. there was nothing around the light.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Multiple lights within a time span unknown if they were the same

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i have been watching object / objects in the sky the entire month of october. tonight nov 1sr the object appeared much larger and was white with out the usual colorful lights. i picked up the binoculars expecting to see the colored lights with them, but this object was an elongated oval or cigar shape with white pulsating lights outlining it top and bottom.  what was very unusual is that what would be described as the oval body was more a silver white shade with at least 100 tiny sparkling lights. it almost looked elegant.  this was total opposite in appearance as to what we had been seeing in the same area, ne of us towards pittsburgh, pa. the third time i looked at it through the binoculars, it had morphed into an elongated boxy rectangle shape. there were other objects that looked like what we had seen in october in the sky also, and two took a flight path to the west.  they were much closer than a jet and had what would be described as a gliding motion ... they just glided across the night sky much lower, much larger, and quicker than a jet or helicopter. i told my husband you have to see this. he looked through the binoculars and immediately said go get the camera. he was a previous skeptic.  the repeated sightings in october have changed him into a possible believer, but this sighting tonight has finally converted him. he was very disappointed that i could not catch anything on film using two different digital cameras. i have no idea what type of camera would work. ... tonight's sighting is like nothing we have ever seen before or could have imagined.  the entire object looked almost transparent and glowed and sparkled white.  it is now 2100 11 pm est and i am going to go back out to see if it is still there.  it is cloudy and it disappears then reappears as if it might be going behind the clouds but not sure, it might be fading in and out.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Object was in same location as other sightings during month of oct but using binoculars saw it was completely different objec as previously seen.  white and changed shape.

content.detailedDescription: On sept 30 2013 at 10pm 2200 hrs my husband and i went on front porch to sit. as soon as i sat down i noticed bright lights to my left (ne). as soon as i saw it i said what is that ... it was an upside down v with bright flashing/pulsating lights so large it appeared close although probably was far away. looked like i could reach out and touch it. appeared a bit bigger than soft ball size. we watched it for app 15 min then it went to the left and then back then to right and back and then up and down. it stayed in one place after that.  it was above the tree line the whole time which appeared to be about 5 ft. we got binoculars and could see the individual flashing lights were outlining the v shape. we went back in and then every time we went back out it was still there until about 1 am or so.  we have seen this in the same approximate position 18-20 times in month of october but it is more a boomerang shape now with same flashing lights. several times there were much much smaller ones darting about and several times there were the exact same thing in several positions that could be seen through the tree branches. they have same shape and lights and some are stationary while others moved back and forth horizontally. i have also seen them in a flight path towards the west. one will travel and then another will follow in the same path. larger and closer than a jet and is a gliding motion. i am filing another report of what we saw tonight nov 1st which was very different. we saw this as reported for exactly 1 monthooct and now the 1st of this month nov it has changed drastically.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Upside down v shape with random rapidly flashing lights seen ne towarrds pittsburgh same location at least 3 hours

content.detailedDescription: Heading back to work from lunch i noticed people pointing at the sky so i looked to see what the fuss was n i saw this orb looking object next to the sun i thought weather bloons n went on my way an hour or so later i spotted it near the sun an then i noticed it spin in a way an off this orb looking object went i was stuned as threw out the day i heard about it an blew it off untill i saw it myself
content.summary: Hovedrd with the sun the spun an took off

content.detailedDescription: In my back yard looking west/southwest approximately 7pm me and 2 others witness a very white shooting star appear to disintegrate while descending somewhere over hayward/san fransisco.  i cannot make a determination on range.  shortly after, maybe 5 seconds a bright red orb appears at 30-40 degrees above the horizon stationary for 15 seconds and moves across the sky about 10 degrees to the left over about 5 seconds, and then rapidly accelerates away, not over the horizon but up and out, the light faded slowly over around 4-6 seconds as this happened.  as soon as it was gone another one appears where the other had started out, but remains stationary for 20 seconds before disappearing in the same fashion as the first light.  a friend arrived shortly after and he reported seeing the shooting star like object and red orb while driving but lost view of it when the road he was on curved.
content.summary: Shooting star then, 2 red orb appears and then accelerates away fast

content.detailedDescription: I was warming up my truck and just happene to look up and noticed a moving green light. i noticed it because it wasn't flashing as a normal aircraft would. there was a flashing white light fallowing it then it just stopped flashing and i couldn't see it anymore. the green light made a straight line till it got out of sight behind some trees. then a solid white light (not flashing)came back from where i last saw the green light and faded out of site as if it burned out. i saw this from benton mo. just south of cape girardeau. it was still dark outside but at the speed it was moving i would think it would have been close enough to hear if it was a plane or helicopter.
content.summary: Saw a solid green light fallowed by a flashing white light

content.detailedDescription: Trunk or treat,methodist church,we all saw. i saw the brightness,then it changed colors,then kept going faster and dissapeared. i thought that's one hell of a prank for halloween,
content.summary: Like a bright star moving very fast,faster than a plane or helicopter.

content.detailedDescription: I went out to lake cassidy in marysville washington around 11-12 in the afternoon. i did the ce-5 meditation that dr. steven greer performs with cseti. for what seemed to be a half hour i visualized looking down at myself first from a close distance than from above the city, then state, then country, then earth, then further and further shooting through space. using nothing but positive vibes of wanting to experience and learn. for about what seemed to be a minute i saw myself on a craft looking at two beings. i just had a feeling of awe and confusion. they looked to be about 4 feet in height and had bear looking noses but tanned white skin. both looked slightly overweight and had curly blonde hair. after this meditation i felt the need to take a picture of the sky. so i did and when i looked at the picture i saw the craft. it has 4 lights and 8 lights when zoomed in and is transparent with a dome shape it is either very large or close to me. i attached the original image, zoom in to see the additional 4 lights. the image is facing 215 degrees sw and my location was 48* 3' 45" n/ 122* 6' 21" w
content.summary: Did ce-5 meditation

content.detailedDescription:
Driving back from benton arkansas around 8pm saw 2 lights in clear sky that appeared to be airplane landing lights, no blinking around them and noticed they were not moving.. the airport in in opposite direction as well.  eventually around alexander exit i drove under the 2 lights hovering and could not see any shape of what they were from, kept on my journey.. when i got to cantrell rd in little rock i noticed when i looked back south i could still see the lights still hovering. i had traveled maybe 8-10 miles since i drove under them.  i pulled over took a video, as i pulled over i noticed 4 military helicopters flying in formation from maumelle/north little rock area flying towards the object in the south.  i then noticed lots of helicopters in the sky in all directions, i think i counted 8 of them, i have to watch the video to be sure cause i counted them out.  watching the object i noticed that now it had ejected 5 smaller lights to the right of the object about 1" away from my vantage point.  these 5 lights made an l shape and blinked bright white light in sync and just hovered in place.  after 10 mins of observing i left the road and continued to drive.  

i felt kind of comfortable and cool when i first drove under it and when i saw it again, but when i saw the military helicopters flying in formation towards it thats when i got a little scared.  

i do not know what this object was, i do not claim that it was alien and i do not claim that it was military. for all i know it could have been either.  i just saw something odd, unidentified and of obvious interest to many many helicopters that normally would have no reason to be flying around little rock at 8pm-9pm on halloween.
content.summary: Looked like 2 giant headlights with no other lights immediately near it. ejected 5 other smaller objects that blinked in sync

content.detailedDescription:
My husband went to the store are 6:55 pm he called me right away to tell me to outside to look at the lights. i could not see them, he told me to walk down toward the edge of the driveway and i saw a bright light. it was very bright. my husband told me to call someone, so i contacted mufon and left a message. he was so frightened he asked me to call the air force, but i couldn���t find a phone number. i watched it and took video of it and so did he.  then he came home, and his boss called him on ranch 4 to go meet him. i answered the phone. i asked our boss to look outside to see the ufo, he said it looked like a planet or something he was not sure. i hung up the phone while my husband was going to going met him his boss. while my husband was gone i was outside looking up and the object moved from the driveway side to my front door side. i was getting very upset, because he was still at ranch 4 with his boss, so i called the fire department, but they said they did not see it. the fire department is far from us, so maybe they did not, but i think they were scared. 
what did you think the object was when you first noticed it? a ufo. 
describe the object and its actions and motions in detail. it kept moving from the side of the driveway to the front door. it did this 4 times and then vanished. it was back and forth from 7:00pm until 8:45pm. i starting getting panicky when my turkeys fluffed up, and the chickens started clucking, and the lamb seemed dazed. 
describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object. i have seen ufo���s a lot as i have previously reported off and on for the last 18 years, but this time was different. i really was frightened, and i still am a tad.  
how did you lose sight of the object? it disappeared just like that. 
as i am uploading the pictures and videos from both cell-phone, my husband being on ranch 4 and i being on ranch 3 both have identical pictures and videos.
content.summary: It upset my husband and i so much we call mufon, because i have made a report before, and the fire department, also neighbors.

content.detailedDescription: 1) i was walking uphill on pine st. with my boy trick or treating. 2)it was so bright and sooo fast. 3) i thought it was a ufo.I was navy air and am a sky watcher and have never seen anything like this. 4)i noticed it at about 12:oo moving east to west. i don't know if flying is the right word but it def. was not falling. had to be going over 1,000 mph in a straight line. 5)i thought holy s#%t! that was a ufo! kept watching the sky for several min. after that but saw nothing more. 6) lost sight of the object as it passed behind brionies hills.
content.summary: Brilliant white ball. looked almost the size of venus. bigger and brighter than any meteor

content.detailedDescription: It was a little after 8:00 p.M. i walked out on the back patio to have a smoke like i always do.I just randomly looked over at the foothills to my right, and saw this red,round object with what looked like orange fire( like you see from a rocket) coming out of the back. the thing was, that it made no sound, yet it was moving toward the stationary red lights on the foothill. i remembered that i had my phone in my pocket. so, without taking my eyes off of it, i pulled out my phone. while i was doing this, the orange fire that was coming out of the back went out, and the object stopped moving. it was still red. when i turned my camera on, it turned from red to just a white round light. it then started to move away from the lights on the hil, still not making any sound. i managed to get three still pics. i watched it move away and disappear. the color remained white as it left. at first, i thought that it was a shooting star or something. but, shooting stars don't stop, hover, change direction and color. i truly have no idea what it was. i wish i had thought to get my phone out sooner, i was just so blown away by what i saw. the first pic is of the object moving toward the foothill lights. the next two are of it moving away.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I walked out into the backyard, looked toward the foothills, and saw it.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing out in my back yard, when i heard a helicopter comming from east to west. as it came over my house, a little south of me, i noticed a star. the star seemed out of place because the sun had gone down but there was still some fant light. what i thought to be a star brightened up and started moving, slowly going east. it was about 35 - 40 degrees above the horizon, as it went east it very abruptly turned to the right heading south by southeast. it was still quite bright  at this point, then faded and went south by southeast at a high rate of speed. i live under several flight paths, from all the airports and military bases. this object had no other lights or strobes, and traveled way to fast to be any of ours when it sped off. i lost site of it as it was too far away at this point. i was a little bumed, i wanted to see more. i always have and always will look to the skies!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Watching helicopter, noticed star moving then hovering then moving east, abruptly changed coarse moving  sse, same altitude, brightened , high rate of speed

content.detailedDescription:
Just after sunset i walked outside and looked to the west to see if the bright object had shown up yet. it showed up after sunset, but before twilight. around 7:30 pm. i have taken quite a few photos of it over the past months, and decided to take a few more. i set the camera (on a tripod) on the roof of my vehicle. i took eleven photos over a twenty minute period. the first photos showed the white object (orb) with a halo around it. the last photos showed a more distinct orb shaped object, with a purple center.
it's as though the 'cloud' around the orb was a product of it's flight. after remaining stationary, the 'cloud' disappeared, showing more distict detail. in other words, i'm guessing the apparant ionization surrounding it was a product of its propulsion.
i left the camera set up, and an hour later i went outside to see if the object had moved. i witnessed a jet coming from the direction of san antonio (coming from the southeast) headed straight for the object. i decided the pilot was a lot braver than i. the object increased in brightness as the jet drew closer. the 'halo' again appeared around the object, as though it had fired up its engine. i had the impression of a cat arching it's back and the fur standing out. i would guess the jet flew within two miles of the object. about four minutes later, another jet appeared, following the same path as the first. this time the object retreated around ten miles into the distance.
i happened to check on the object about twenty minutes later and witnessed another jet approach the object from the north. this time the object disappeared into the distance.
the first photo shows the object after it first appeared, with the 'halo' surrounding it.
the second photo shows the object in more detail with a purple center.
the third photo shows the object after the second jet approached it.
i recommend zooming in on the photos for a better view.
content.summary: Bright white glowing object   makes it's nightly appearance

content.detailedDescription: I was outside my apartment with my husband looking at a plane that had a solid red and solid blue light.  we thought it odd because it was not flashing.  we live near an airport so we see planes all the time and the lights always flash. we were wondering if this was a drone because there was no sound. my neighbor came out at this time and we were talking about the plan.  she was looking at it and then saw the ufo.  i looked up and also saw it.  it move quickly from south to north.  we have an open field in front of our building and the craft came from there and swiftly flew over our building. the craft was v shaped and amber in color.  the actual v shape was not illuminated however there was a square at the top of the v and two squares on either side forming a v shape. i have never seen anything like this and neither has my neighbor.  the craft moved swiftly and had no sound.  the plane or drone was following behind.  we went out into the field and watched the plane and drone circle several times.  the v craft did not appear again.
content.summary: Craft was was v shaped with square at tip of v and two squares on each side of v. dim color.

content.detailedDescription: I walked around the corner of my house on a sunny cloudless day while smoking a cigarette when a glint of light caught my eye. i turned to find myself looking strait a egg shaped, silver pod. at first i thought it was just a big inflatable something but the details of this thing were unworldly. the surface of this thing rippled like water, like it was in a constant state of change. it was dead silent not making the slightest sound while it sat there suspended about 10 to 15 feet off the ground. i was in shock i couldn't move, all i could do is watch it slowly started move back and forth over my neighbor's yard. i watched it for about 2 minuets until it noticed me or something cause it turned the tapered "the pointier end," strait at me and then turned away and took off very close to the ground barely above the tree line. i don't know what that was, but if you saw this thing, you would be able to tell that this thing is not from around here like not from our world. there are 2 other events id like to tell. this is the first account and from what i can tell it won't be the last...
content.summary: It was may 23rd 2013 at 1:49 pm  when i saw the first ufo there are several other sighings

content.detailedDescription: On rolling road in baltimore county saw many cars on road with people out of cars looking towards sky.  stopped and looked saw a cigar shaped oblect looked like a jet with no wings.   saw many other small lights going in different direction near by.  had windows down side and could see figures looking out. craft made a soft sound kind of like an air sound. it tilted a little and then shot off. everyone there just shrugged their shoulders and got in and drove off not sure if this is correct date but a lot of other people saw it too
content.summary: Wittnessed ufo with many other people

content.detailedDescription: I was driving in my car and my 14 years old daughter were on her passenger seat. we were on north 27 highway from walmart on cagan crossing on the way home.   i looked up in the sky because i love to see the stars and then i spotted 3 red/orange lights triangular and it was so visible. i closed my eyes and opened to make sure it was just a trick. the lights were still there and didn't move.  i tapped my daughter and asked her to check the lights out.  i had to look close to see if the lights were flashing like airplane and helicopter flash their lights and their lights should be very bright like blue and white..Sometime, red.   she said ufo aloud and we were laughing but we were baffling because we never seen that kind of lights.    then one right light vanished instantly and marked red glow like an aura that was moving right on the direction and then two lights moved closer at the same time on vertical.  then we got home and we both got out of my car.  i am deaf and my daughter heard the sounds like boom boom that is almost similar to fireworks but there were no firework sight and it's illegal here. only on the seasonal like new years eve and july 4th.  we were goose bumped what we saw and she heard the sounds.
content.summary: 3 red/orange lights triangular in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling along the west coast and camped overnight near crescent city,  california. when the sun was about to set, i took a few pictures of the coast and ocean with my cellphone. i did not notice the orb when i was taking the pictures. when i looked at my pictures later, the orb was clearly visible in different parts of the pictures and were a firey orange in two pictures and white in one picture.
content.summary: Discovered a bright orb over ocean in three different pictures i took. in two pictures, the orb was a firey orange color, and in another picture it is white.

content.detailedDescription: I have  been noticeing these bright lights out side my window at night so i got some binaclers thinking that it was the police or some thing but when i looked threw them i saw three bright lights doing summer salts non top of each othe i see so much it is hard to explain only a few of my close friends have seen it   nobody else seems to care that these objects are doing things at night ever night this goes oni can seem to get any help from these sights so this is it for me i give up
content.summary: Ufo night sighting

content.detailedDescription: I have  been noticeing these bright lights out side my window at night so i got some binaclers thinking that it was the police or some thing but when i looked threw them i saw three bright lights doing summer salts non top of each othe i see so much it is hard to explain only a few of my close friends have seen it   nobody else seems to care that these objects are doing things at night ever night this goes oni can seem to get any help from these sights so this is it for me i give up
content.summary: Ufo night sighting

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home on the evening of wednesday june 5, 2002 watching television. i decided to go for a walk around the little lake in bell roth park at approximately 10:00 pm. when i got to the east side of the lake, i noticed three orange-ish lights in the distance to the west south west. i watched the three lights doing aerial maneuvers for a short time then they looked like they were coming in my general direction. i was curious but not afraid. they got to, possibly, a couple of miles from me and made a sharp turn to the north like they were following federal blvd. toward northglenn. i remember wondering if my mother, who lived up in that direction was up and watching the lights too.

after a few moments, they came toward me again and stopped directly above where i was standing at the top of the berm by the lake. i became mildly alarmed when they started coming and by the time they got to me, i was terrified and began looking for a place to hide. i ran toward the childrens playground at the base of the berm. a bright white light shone down, then blinked off and then the lights were gone. when i got back home, my husband asked me where i'd been and told me that he'd walked around the lake at least three times looking for me. i was confused and felt like i'd been drugged.
content.summary: Lights and abduction

content.detailedDescription: my self and my friend took a drive to rimrock lake where we go to 4 wheel and we was parked facing the lake at the egde of the water motor was turned off we was talking it was dark and all the sudden about 300 feet out in front of us there it was we was kinda freaked out but excited at the same time my friend said what is that i said i dont know he said start the blazer it wouldnt start for a min it never does that but it finally started we slowly started to back up and it got much closer so i steped on the gas goin in reverse turned the back of my blazer south and kept going and it fallowed so that freaked us out and i took off towards a trail that went into the woods we drove about 1/4 of a mile then my friend noticed a silver glowing ball right next to his window i seen it too but it was not the same thing we seen befor that i kept driven threw this wooded trail and it kept fallowing us then all the sudden we was on the other side of the lake missing 3 hours of time not knowing or understanding what happend.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A friend and my self was up in the woods ay rimrock lake sitting in my blazer talking and there it was out of no where

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i we were driving home on us 23 in fenton michigan ,thats when we observed bright lights from far away as we got closer this object was about 200 feet above the freeway going in the same direction and we were, surprized. to see this ufo just as i was going to stop and take photos it reversed itself and it took off going north towards flint michigan and i called 911 and  reported
content.summary: It was big with no noise and bright lights
